message.entry: Expected I1 and I2 to have the same size.
Expected I1 and I2 to have the same class.
Expected the second element of ''DisparityRange'' to be greater than the first element, and their difference be divisible by 16.
ROI input is not supported. Consider cropping images prior to using this function.
Difference between maximum and minimum values of ''DisparityRange'' must be less than or equal to 128.
Difference between maximum and minimum values of ''DisparityRange'' must be divisible by 8.
Maximum value of ''DisparityRange'' must be less than image width({0}).
Absolute minimum value of ''DisparityRange''must be less than image width({0}).
Maximum memory allowed by the program is exceeded. Consider reducing input image size.
Maximum value of ''DisparityRange'' must be less than or equal to 256.
Image width must be greater than or equal to sum of maximum ''DisparityRange'' value and ''BlockSize''
Minimum value of ''DisparityRange'' must be 0 when input images are gpuArray objects.
Difference between maximum and minimum values of ''DisparityRange'' must be divisible by 16.
Difference between maximum and minimum values of ''DisparityRange'' must be less than image width({0}).
Second element of ''DisparityRange'' must be greater than the first element.
Invalid data type. Input images must be uint8, uint16, int16, single or double matrices.
